name: admin-panel
description: MERN CRUD app to manage mentors and assign tasks to them for a academy like usecase.

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev-start" "cd client && npm run start"
scripts.postinstall: npm run client-install && npm run server-install
scripts.client-build: cd client && npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.server-build: cd server && npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run client-build && npm run server-build

author: codeagni
